entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'he' and 'Harry'. The text describes Harry's actions and emotions throughout the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, mentioned as 'she' and 'Hermione'. Hermione is described as being pulled back by Harry and screaming in pain.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A snake that falls from the ceiling and causes chaos. The text describes its actions and behavior throughout the scene.

relationships.description: Harry pulls Hermione back across the bed to protect her from the snake. This is described as Harry 'seized' and 'dragging' Hermione with him.
